level.heading: FEES FOR THE ISSUING AND AMENDING OF VITAL RECORDS (ยง 29-2880)

level.text: The following fees shall be for the services provided by the Department of Health Vital Records Division:
Recording of Legal Change of Name
Certificate of Search (for each 3 years searched)
Administrative Copy of a Vital Record

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 39 DCR 492 (January 24, 1992); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 49 DCR 4096 (May 3, 2002); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 54 DCR 1664 (February 23, 2007).
